thread.title: Why Lindsey Vonn’s Bad Knee Could Be a Good Thing

author: Rachel Bachman
title: Why Lindsey Vonn’s Bad Knee Could Be a Good Thing
text:
The TV commercial shows Lindsey Vonn careening into a fence, being wheeled into surgery, then sweating her way through rehab and back into racing form. The American Alpine skier’s recovery from injuries, including a serious one to her right knee, has shaped her image as a survivor of long odds.
But the evidence suggests the odds might not be so long after all.
Certainly,... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
